original_text: So the soldiers' leader quickly took some other officers and a large group of soldiers and they ran down to the crowd. The angry crowd of people saw the leader with his soldiers. So then they stopped hitting Paul.
korean_text: 그가 급히 군인들과 백부장들을 거느리고 달려 내려가니 그들이 천부장과 군인들을 보고 바울 치기를 그치는지라

sentences.original_text: So the soldiers' leader quickly took some other officers
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 군인들의 지휘관은 다른 장교들을 데려왔습니다

sentences.original_text: and a large group of soldiers
and they ran down to the crowd.
The angry crowd of people saw the leader
So then they stopped hitting Paul.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 바울을 때리는 것을 멈췄습니다
